Paytable.paybackBody: For this game, the long-term, theoretically-expected payback is {RTP}.
Paytable.overallChances: There is a 1 in {odds} overall chance of winning a prize on each play.

Error.genericErrorText: There has been an internal error. EXIT and relaunch the game. 0

Game.page1:
Select 6 of 9 ‘?’ tiles to reveal symbols.Select 6 of 9 ‘?’ tiles to reveal symbols.Select 6 of 9 ‘?’ tiles to reveal symbols.

Connect revealed symbols from left to right on the grid to win up to 2 corresponding prizes.Connect revealed symbols from left to right on the grid to win up to 2 corresponding prizes.Connect revealed symbols from left to right on the grid to win up to 2 corresponding prizes.

Reveal lights to fill the multiplier and bonus meters to trigger the bonuses.Reveal lights to fill the multiplier and bonus meters to trigger the bonuses.Reveal lights to fill the multiplier and bonus meters to trigger the bonuses. 0
Game.page1Port:
Select 6 of 9 ‘?’ tiles to reveal symbols. 

Connect revealed symbols from left to right
 on the grid to win up to 2 corresponding prizes. 

Reveal lights to fill the multiplier
 and bonus meters to trigger the bonuses. 0
Game.page2:
Find a Purple Light to trigger the Picker Bonus.
Select dials to reveal prizes.
Up to 6 prizes may be awarded.
Reveal COLLECT to end the bonus and win all revealed prizes. 0
Game.page2Port:
Find a Purple Light to trigger the Picker Bonus.
Select dials to reveal prizes.
Up to 6 prizes may be awarded.
Reveal COLLECT to end the bonus
and win all revealed prizes. 0
Game.page3:
Find 3 Green Lights to trigger the Multiplier Bonus.

Press START to reveal a multiplier of 2x to 5x to apply to the total win. 0
Game.page3Port:
Find 3 Green Lights to trigger the Multiplier Bonus.

Press START to reveal a multiplier of
2x to 5x to apply to the total win. 0
